title: I got a mystery box from riot
body: So i got a mystery box from riot some reason but when i pressed accept, it got out of the mystery box received screen but I don't know where to open it or find it.....

replies.body: You can usually find rewards or gifts that appear through a toast like that in your purchase history.  It looks like this particular toast was for the Worlds Pickem poro icon.  Congrats!
